00027    class RaggedMatrix
00028    {
00029 
00030    public:
00031 
00032       // Protected default constructor, to prohibit direct instantiation.
00033 
00034       // Private copy constructor, to prohibit copy construction.

00126    /*
00127    * Get number of rows.
00128    */
00129    template <typename Data>
00130    inline int RaggedMatrix<Data>::capacity1()
00131    { return capacity1_; }
00132 
00133    /*
00134    * Get number of columns in row i.
00135    */
00136    template <typename Data>
00137    inline int RaggedMatrix<Data>::capacity2(int i)
00138    { return capacity2_[i]; }
00139 
00140    /*
00141    * Return element (i,j) of matrix by const reference.
00142    */
00143    template <typename Data>
00144    inline const Data& RaggedMatrix<Data>::operator() (int i, int j) const
00145    {
00146       assert(data_ != 0);
00147       assert(i >= 0);
00148       assert(i < capacity1_);
00149       assert(j >= 0);
00150       assert(j < capacity2_[i]);
00151       return *(rows_[i] + j);
00152    }
00153 
00154    /*
00155    * Return element (i,j) of matrix by reference.
00156    */
00157    template <typename Data>
00158    inline Data& RaggedMatrix<Data>::operator() (int i, int j)
00159    {
00160       assert(data_ != 0);
00161       assert(i >= 0);
00162       assert(i < capacity1_);
00163       assert(j >= 0);
00164       assert(j < capacity2_[i]);
00165       return *(rows_[i] + j);
00166    }
